- #bash #if test jestli je uživatel root
    ```bash
    SUID=$(id | cut -d " " -f 1 | cut -d "=" -f 2 | cut -d "(" -f 1)
    if [ ! "$SUID" == "0" ]; then
        echo "Must run this as root!"
        exit 1
    fi
    ```
